title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Charlestown, MA)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was quick. If you're an IHP student they want you to work there! I had to decline due to not being able to make the full orientation. If you're able to make orientation I would suggest taking the position.
Interview Questions: What makes you want to work in Spaulding?

title: Patient Care Assistant (PCA) Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Cambridge, MA)
Interview Descriptions: Very easy, mine was over zoom cause I started in COVID. but everyone was super welcoming and helpful. The nurse manager is great and super flexible with schedules. I have worked here for 2 years now and really enjoy my unit
Interview Questions: what are your strengths/weaknesses, what can you offer to the unit

title: Front Office Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interview provided helpful details about the role, culture and company. The questions about my experience and interest in the role were relevant and the interviewer was prepared in terms of familiarity with my work history.
Interview Questions: what I could see myself doing at this organization in the future

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Quick and easy! The conversation was very well facilitated just asking and answering questions, the manager was very kind and approachable. Just the regular questions one would expect telling about yourself etc.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself was one question also strengths

title: Occupational Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Spoke with supervisor for the first interview. Second round was with the same supervisor and two other OTs with a supervisor-type role. Interviewers were very nice and made the process comfortable for me.
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult situation at work and how you handled it.

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions:
fairly straight forward. lots of personality questions. 
 Introductions. One of the most important steps in the interview process just so happens to be the first. ...
#2) Small Talk. After introductions are finished, it is a good idea conduct a bit of small talk with the candidate. ...
#3) Information Gathering. ...
#4) Question/Answer. ...
Interview Questions:
Tell me something about yourself.
How did you hear about this position?
Why do you want to work here?

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Had a call with the clinic manager and then was asked to come in for a formal in person interview. Interviewed by clinic manager one on one but was then able to meet some of the other people I would be working with as I was at the office.
Interview Questions: Given that this is an outpatient physical therapy clinic do you see a future for yourself as a physical therapist?

title: SLP-CF Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly, quick interview. The first question was whether I'd been involved in Spaulding before, which I haven't. We briefly went over my interests and skills. It was with a higher up at the company so he wasn't familiar with the job specifics.
Interview Questions:
Have you been involved in Spaulding before?
What are you hoping to achieve in career?

title: Occupational Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Was contacted by a recruiter and had one interview with the manager (?) of the rehab team for the floor and the manager of the inpatient rehab department for the hospital
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: It was wonderful, very nice! I enjoyed the interviewing process. I was made very comfortable and I would recommend it! I was asked good questions and the discussion moved along very nicely, a very lovely rehabilitation hospital!
Interview Questions: Describe a moment where you made a mistake and how you learned from it.

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Both on the phone and in person, two over the phone and then one in person included a tour of the hospital as well. They called me back within a week with my offer
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: The first interview portion was via Zoom, and the 2nd interview within the next week in person. Both were with the outpatient clinic manager. It was a pretty streamlined process overall.
Interview Questions:
Have you worked with/for Spaulding before?
Why would you want to work here?
What was a tough communication situation you've been through and how did you respond?
What is would a typical treatment look like?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: (Pre-Covid) Initial phone interview with HR, in person interview with unit manager. Straight forward questions to be expected during the interview. Easygoing interview, opportunity to shadow an RN on the unit afterwards.
Interview Questions: How would previous employers describe you?

title: Registerd Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Initial HR Phone Interview : very straightforward. explained the position and asked why I was interested in SRH. How did my previous degree lead me to nursing? Followed up by scheduling second interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Spaudling?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very smooth, held over zoom. Interviewer was professional and cordial. Questions were prepared and fair. Strengths/Weaknesses. Handling a difficult patient. Teamwork, etc. Gave a lot of information about the facility and work environment.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Had phone screen with HR recruiter first, then scheduled the interview through them. Interviewed with nurse manager via Zoom. Heard from HR on their decision within less than two weeks.
Interview Questions: Define what teamwork means to me

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Was a positive experience all around, hiring staff was all very friendly. Had a phone interview with HR, then a 1:1 interview with the nurse manager and followed up with a few hours shadowing on the unit.
Interview Questions: Q: What was your favorite clinical experience? What was your least favorite clinical experience? And Why.

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Scheduled a 1-hour in person interview with rehab manager and the PT director for the 3rd floor. Both employees were polite and gracious during the interview, and afterwards gave me a tour of the floor and facilities.
Interview Questions: What would you add to the rehab team here at Spaulding?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Hyannis, MA) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Professional and courteous interviewer. She was pleasant and made me fell at easy. There was no openings at that time, but I was encouraged to keep searching their job postings and keep applying.
Interview Questions: Relative experience

title: Patient Care Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was very informal. The manager just asked how I was doing and how I heard about this job. The interview only lasted 5 minutes due to the manager being called in for a rapid response. I was sent up to HR right away to fill out paperwork to be hired.
Interview Questions: What are your hobbies?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Met with HR who went through resume and asked general interview questions. Then met with nurse manager who gave brief overview of job and units, and introduced to potential floor
Interview Questions: What was your favorite clinical and why? What was your least favorite?

title: Research Assistant II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was Skyping in - it started off as a group interview with another person Skyping in and the rest of the lab (minus the professor). They asked questions directed to both of us. I kept going first on the questions because the other guy Skyping in was smart. Then, the professor came in, and he talked for about half an hour. And then we did a one on one talk with the professor and the lab manager. It was the most nerve wracking experience I've ever had.
Interview Questions: "Give us a convincing recruitment spiel in fifteen seconds or less. Go."

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was an international fellow so the interview process was over Skype. It was part of a program to do clinical research with a research scholar J1 visa. This is my only experience working in the US so I m sorry I do not have anything else to say.
Interview Questions: Why would you like to leave the beautiful weather of your country (Philipines) to come to New England?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: Took about an hour and a half all together. Met with HR first, then had a quick meeting and tour with the nursing supervisors. Once we had finished with that, met with HR again and discussed hours and pay. Offered the job right on the spot.
Interview Questions: What are your weaknesses?

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Charlestown, MA) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied on the partners career website for all the open evening Unit Secretary positions starting in February, and I eventually got called for an interview in March. I had an interview with the Unit Manager and then the Charge Nurse for the unit I would be working on. Then I went back to HR and interviewed with the woman in charge of hiring for the nursing department. All the questions were pretty straightforward. I got an offer from HR at the end of the interview and came back a few days later to be cleared by Occupational Health and sign my offer letter.
Interview Questions: How has your previous work experience prepared you for this job?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Charlestown, MA) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was called the day I applied and came in for an interview with HR two days later. I also got to meet the nurse manager. I was offered a per diem RN position the day of the interview.
Interview Questions: How many years have you been a nurse?

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions:
-Submission of electronic application.
-Long wait time between application submission and actual contact from HR.
-Contact by HR.
-Interview with HR followed by that with RN manager.
-Tour of the unit with brief introductions.
-RN manager touches base with HR.
-Same day job offer.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a complaint from a patient and their family?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital
Interview Descriptions: basic, interviewed with PI and assistant.  No unusual question
Interview Questions: What do you anticipate being the most difficult part of this job

title: X-Ray Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Submitted resume, then a face to face interview
Interview Questions: Why I left previous job

title: Unit Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Cambridge, MA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and they responded within two weeks to set up an interview. First interview the manager was out so I interviewed with HR. She was very professional and interview was relaxed. Came in for a second interview a week later with the manager and it was also very relaxed and offered me the position. They focused less on technical knowledge and more as a better fit.
Interview Questions: What are your future career goals?

title: Occupational Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Salem, MA) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: At Salem- Spaulding North Shore: Met with multiple individuals in 3 groups: hiring rehab supervisor who gave tour of facility and explained job duties; then rehab director and 2 rehab supervisors; and finally 2 staff OTs. Each asked about past experiences and interest in population. Posed questions on dealing with difficult patients/ families, delivering bad news or making recommendations that might not be popular with family, what would you do in  different scenarios.  Took several weeks for decision making but finally HR called with offer. Union position so they said no negotiation on salary, must contribute union dues whether you decide to join or not.
Interview Questions: How would you respond to an angry family member who was yelling and the situation was escalating.

title: Pt Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was a co-op student from Northeastern so the process was very organized. I recieved an email before the interview to schedule a time. I went in for a half hour interview. The person interviewing me was very pleasant.
Interview Questions: Nothing specific or interesting

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Salem, MA) in May 2011
Interview Descriptions: Quick process. Applied and was called in for interview about 2 weeks later. Typical interview questions you can google. I was hired about a week later after they checked my references and all my paperwork came back.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths? What are your weaknesses?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Boston, MA) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: Interview - Shadowing - Hired - 3 months probation
Interview Questions: How was shadowing?

title: HOSPITAL CASE MANAGER Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3+ months. I interviewed at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (Cambridge, MA) in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: It took forever to get an interview since the HR person never forwarded my application. She is very incompetent. If you apply online you have to keep calling the manager personally
Interview Questions: N/A
